lead_paragraph: The Cavaliers have made other arrangements for players who do not want to stay at a New York hotel branded by President-elect Donald Trump.

headline.print_headline: LeBron, Cavs Teammates Not Staying at Trump New York Hotel
headline.main: LeBron, Cavs Teammates Not Staying at Trump New York Hotel

snippet: The Cavaliers have made other arrangements for players who do not want to stay at a New York hotel branded by President-elect Donald Trump....
